cast.name: 玛丽安·阿奎莱拉 Marián Aguilera
娜乌西卡·邦宁 Nausicaa Bonnín

introduction: Chicago International Children's Film FestivalYear	Result	Award	Category/Recipient(s)1997 	Won 	Adult's Jury Award - Certificate of Merit 	Feature Film or VideoRosa VergésGiffoni Film FestivalYear	Result	Award	Category/Recipient(s)1997 	Won 	Golden Gryphon 	Early ScreensRosa VergésIt's Christmas and the 7 Year old Hector is traveling with his parents to France in order to visit his grandmother. He is not pleased because it's always boring there. After his father found that "eternity" is a missing word in his crossword and an old woman described it as a timeless place, Hector writes a letter to the three wise man making the wish that he would rather travel to eternity that to France. His wish comes true.
